name: imanghafoori/laravel-middlewarize
description: Use laravel middlewares on any method calls in your app

suggest.imanghafoori/laravel-heyman: It allows to write expressive code to authorize, validate and authenticate.
suggest.imanghafoori/laravel-anypass: Allows you login with any password in local environment.
suggest.imanghafoori/laravel-masterpass: You can easily set a master password without code change.
